name: imgix Image
description: An image component, powered by imgix

attribute_definitions.name: Alt Text
attribute_definitions.description: The image alt text shown by the component.

attribute_definitions.name: Sizes attribute
attribute_definitions.description: The sizes attribute for the image to help the image behave responsibly. If the image is a fixed size, set this to the image width.

attribute_definitions.name: Width
attribute_definitions.description: The width of the image in pixels. If set, will make the image render at fixed-size, making sizes have no effect

attribute_definitions.name: Height
attribute_definitions.description: The height of the image in pixels. If set, will make the image render at fixed-size, making sizes have no effect

attribute_definitions.name: Format
attribute_definitions.description: The format to apply to the image. It is recommended to use the auto parameter to set format, by including 'format' in the setting above. If set, this will override auto-formatting

attribute_definitions.name: Auto
attribute_definitions.description: The automatic parameters to apply to the image. Values should be separated with a comma, e.g. 'format,compress'. Default recommended is 'format,compress'

attribute_definitions.name: Crop
attribute_definitions.description: The crop parameter to apply to the image. The default is 'clip'.
